presentation.description: Innovative and detail-oriented programmer and systems developer with deep enthusiasm for creating cutting-edge software solutions and optimizing complex systems.

biography.title: Biography
biography.initialContent: Brazilian, married and with two children. Looking forward to joining a forward-thinking organization that promotes creativity and embraces technological advancements. Seeking a challenging role in a dynamic and collaborative environment where I can apply my technical proficiency and passion for delivering high-quality software solutions, I aspire to design and implement scalable and efficient applications that elevate user experiences and simplify critical business processes ensuring perfect integration between different systems.
biography.finalContent: Committed to continuous learning and emerging technologies, I am prepared to contribute my strong problem-solving skills and collaborative mindset to drive the development team's success and exceed organizational goals.

1.description: Full-Stack Computer Programmer. Working in the process of development and maintenance of website layouts, using front-end languages Javascript, CSS3 and HTML5. Programming/maintaining Web applications and Rest API’s, using the ASP.NET C# back-end applications and SQL Server Database. Adopting the concepts of Programming in Clean Architecture.

2.description: Intern in the digital inclusion department, working as a professor of information technology for municipal school students and guiding teachers in the use of applications, hardware and software in computer labs and classrooms

finalMessage.message: “Details matter, it's worth waiting to get it right”.
